> > ok i have decided that when my charecters have finished all the 
normal
> > levels + tev50 + dph's levels i will create my own set of levels, 

I am not so sure that's a good idea.  Most of my legitimate right now 
is almost to the point of having trouble with teleporters because of 
running too fast.  My legitimate archmage has lots of troubles with 
teleporters because he is above experience level 200.  I'm telling you 
that I'm leaning towards a large army of experience level 50-75 
characters rather a team composed of one experience level 200+ 
character just because of teleporters.  You won't believe how fast you 
can outrun your own attacks at that level and that makes using 
teleporters difficult.  I'd like to redo teleporters to allow you to 
press a key on a teleporter just to teleport.
